amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 5 of the bill which provides for a repeal of waiver and delay authority and for additional powers of the chief counsel for advocacy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 114-14 to strike section 5 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Conyers.
